name: Stopping by Woods on a Snowy Evening to Steal Treasure
name_original: Stopping by Woods on a Snowy Evening to Steal Treasure
description:
In 1923, Robert Frost published a half decent poem called "Stopping by Woods on a Snowy Evening." In this short browser game, you will improve that okay poem until it reaches its full potential.

Created for the Gaming Like It's 1923 game jam, an event to make games based on artistic works from 1923 that have newly entered the public domain.
